modName: Winterhold Ruins - House and Forge Addon
summary: Adding a forge, some intact buildings and a stable to the Expanded Winterhold Destruction Ruins by Rhinala70 and phaota with an abandoned forge. Compatible with Cliff Cabin Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This mod is adding a forge, some intact newbuild houses and a stable to the Winterhold Ruins as they are presented in the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8333/?] Expanded Winterhold Destruction Ruins [/url] mod by Rhinala70 and phaota.

If you use the Expanded Winterhold Destruction Ruins [color=orange]Exterior[/color], there is an optional version in the files to use. You'll find no forge here, the Exterior mod provides one, and if you want a stable, you can cuse my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30329/?]Winterhold Stable Addon[/url] or my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11263/?]Cliff Cabin with Stable[/url] mod.

[b][color=red]NB - load this mod BEFORE the ExpandedWinterholdRuins.esp ![/color][/b]

This solves the bug UnmeiX writes about in the posts!
author: Lametrie

files.name: Winterhold Ruins - House and Forge Addon
files.changelogHtml: Complete rebuild without Cliff Cabin as requirement to fix the bug UnmeiX writes about in the posts!
